# Problem 1

```{r}
data("instacart")

instacart %>% 
  group_by(aisle) %>% 
  summarize(items = n()) %>% 
  arrange(desc(items))
```

```{r}
instacart %>% 
  group_by(aisle) %>% 
  summarize(items = n()) %>% 
  filter(items > 10000) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = items, y = aisle)) + 
  geom_point()
```
